alert.note: Alert for Northern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 21 at 10:50PM EST until November 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch are expected. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In New York, The southern Adirondacks, Lake George Saratoga Region and northern Taconics. In Massachusetts, Northern Berkshire County. In southern Vermont, Bennington and Western Windham Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will change to a mix with sleet and freezing rain around or after midnight. The snow, sleet and freezing rain will change to plain rain Wednesday morning and diminish prior to noontime.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
